title: Advanced Social Studies Course in Higher Education: Flipped Learning Utilizing ARCS Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies theory and practical work experience
context.additional_context: An advanced learning course for current practitioners combining flipped learning with ARCS motivational theory in a VR simulation environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more advanced social studies learning strategies in a flipped learning environment by applying the ARCS motivation theory
Learners can analyze real-world problem-solving scenarios through VR simulations and write reports applying critical thinking
Learners can achieve an average score of 85 or higher in project-based assessments through peer evaluation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
